body: The worst part is that despite being frozen I think they may still be alive...
The ending is too sad, I thought they would survive but in the end they were made into display models.

... I have read thousands of hentai, some were short while others were several hundred page masterpieces, some were happy and some were sad, but I have never read hentai that deepens the abyss of sadness that is in the bottom of my heart like this. Going to a place to simply have fun, but soon losing everything that the person knew and loved, being reduced to nothing but an animal only to be frozen in time within a display case.
